headline: Metrc Taps 25-Year Technology Veteran to Lead Technology & Product Transformation
summary: BJ Fox Named CTO as Leading Regulatory Tech Company Accelerates User-Driven Innovation, Platform ModernizationLAKELAND, Fla., Jan. 28, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Metrc, a leading provider of regulatory track-and-trace systems for highly regulated industries, is kicking off 2026 with renewed focus on innovation and enterprise-grade product development.
